Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,61 @@ +import axios from 'axios'; +import React, { useState } from 'react' +import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; + +function NewData() { + + const [companyName,setCompanyName] = useState(); + const [jobTitle,setjobTitle] = useState(); + const [placementDate,setplacementDate] = useState(); + const [studentId,setstudentId] = useState(); + let base_url = "http://localhost/api/placement"; + let navigate = useNavigate(); + let update = ()=>{ + let data = { + + companyName:companyName, + jobTitle:jobTitle, + placementDate:placementDate, + studentId:studentId + } + + axios.post(base_url,data).then( res=>{ + alert("Updated Successfully !") + navigate("/") + }).catch(err=>{ + alert(err); + navigate("/") + }) + } + + return ( +
